context.title: The JSON-LD context(s) used in the document

id.title: The identifier for the DID subject

controller.title: optional, the entity/entities controlling the DID subject

authentication.title: optional, the set of authentication methods associated with the DID

assertionMethod.title: optional, the set of assertion methods associated with the DID

capabilityInvocation.title: optional, the set of capability invocation methods associated with

capabilityDelegation.title: optional, the set of capability delegation methods associated with

keyAgreement.title: optional, the set of key agreement methods associated with the DID

alsoKnownAs.title: optional, the set of identifiers for other personas or identities

identityDIDDocument.description:
DIDDocument represents a Decentralized Identifier (DID) document that
contains information about the DID subject, such as public keys, verification
methods, and services.

id.description: The ID of the created controller account.

identityMsgCreateControllerAccountRespon.description:
MsgCreateControllerAccountResponse represents the response to a create
controller account request.

identityMsgDeleteControllerAccountRespon.description:
MsgDeleteControllerAccountResponse represents the response to a delete
controller account request.

success.description: Indicates if the registration was successful.

didDocument.description: The DID document associated with the registered identity.

identityMsgRegisterIdentityResponse.description:
MsgRegisterIdentityResponse represents the response to a register identity
request.

identityMsgUpdateControllerAccountRespon.description:
MsgUpdateControllerAccountResponse represents the response to an update
controller account request.

id.title: The identifier for the verification method

type.title: The type of the verification method

controller.title: The entity controlling the verification method

publicKeyJwk.title: optional, the public key in JSON Web Key (JWK) format

publicKeyMultibase.title: optional, the public key in multibase-encoded format

blockchainAccountId.title: optional, the blockchain account identifier associated with the

attestationType.title: optional, the type of attestation associated with the verification

transports.title: optional, the set of transport protocols supported by the

identityVerificationMethod.description:
VerificationMethod represents a verification method that can be used to
authenticate the DID subject or perform other cryptographic operations.

verificationMethod.title: The verification method associated with the relationship

reference.title: The reference identifier for the relationship

type.title: The type of the verification relationship

owner.title: The idx address of the owner of the verification relationship

identityVerificationRelationship.description:
VerificationRelationship represents a relationship between a verification
method and a specific verification purpose (e.g., authentication, assertion,
etc.).
